and postgraduates we have organized the graduation gowns rental service Warmest congratulations on your graduation Rental Information Subject Graduating students in February 2025 Only bachelor s and master s gowns are provided for the rental Only the students who have received the degree can rent the gowns Period Saturday February 15 2025 Tuesday February 25 2025 every day from 9 A M to 6 P M Except Lunch time 12 00 13 00 Rental and Return is unavailable during lunch time Lunch time 12 00 13 00 Return Until 6 P M on the day of rental Location Humanities and Social Sciences Campus International Hall 1 F Lounge Natural Sciences Campus Student Center 1 F Small Auditorium Preparation ID Registration Card Driver s License Residence Card Passport Bag for the Gown Student ID card is not accepted as deposit We ask for your understanding that rental is available only after submission of ID card as a deposit Application for Rental Application Period Thursday February 6 2025 Thursday February 13 2025 Application Process GLS PC version 신청 자격 관리 Click on 금학 기졸 업자 학위 복대 여신 청 Enter Visit Day Campus Refund Account Information Apply Pay 5 000 won to the virtual account Rental Fee 5 000 won Virtual account will be provided for the payment when the rental request is successfully submitted Cash payment will not be supported Due to the bank policy issuing the virtual account may not operate from 12 00 to 12 10 A M 12 00 to 12 40 A M on Fridays The rental fee will be refunded if the gown is not rented after the payment Multiple Times Rental Policy There is no limit to the number of times to rent the gowns but only one gown can be rented at a time The previously rented must be returned before renting another gown The rental fee is 5 000 won regardless of the number of times of the rent Please know that an unused gown will be provided for the first rent and a used gown will be available to rent after the first rent Parking Information Parking fee discounts will be provided for those who have rented graduation gowns HSSC 3 000 won charge for 4 hours NSC 2 000 won charge for 4 hours Parking Fee Payment Process Scan the provided QR Code with Camera Enter the vehicle number and select the vehicle Check parking fee and pay mobile Exit after payment QR Codes will be provided at the rental site Additional fee will be charged for any vehicle staying in the campus more than 30 minutes after the payment In case of HSSC the parking space is small so use public transportation if possible Information on Late Fees Regardless of the number of rental times Gowns must be returned by 6 P M on the day of rental Late fees will be charged if gowns are returned after 6 P M on the day of rental Late Fee Late on the day of rental 5 000 won It will be applied from returning after 6 P M on the day of rental 10 000 won is added for each day of overdue payment ex Returned at 6 20 P M on the day of rental 5 000 won ex Return the day after rental 10 000 won ex Return after 3 days of rental 30 000 won The late payment fee will go into the student council fee account Please understand that late fees are inevitably imposed to prevent the loss and damage of the graduation suit Further Announcement Only traditional graduation gowns are available to rent For the sake of convenience any peer who has the graduate s ID card can rent and return the gown Photo walls and backdrops will be installed during the rental period In case of lost or damaged gowns the corresponding fee may be charged Traditional Bachelor s Degree Gown Set 132 000 won Traditional Master s Degree Gown Set 179 000 won Further Inquiries Social Exchange Department KakaoTalk Channel skkugradu If there is any questions for the rent Please contact us through KakaoTalk first Congratulations on your graduation graduates who are about to begin their journey at Sungkyunkwan University The student council S CATCH will support you to draw a variety of your future paths that will shine brighter

117438.title: [글로벌 학습 플랫폼] 해외저명대학 교수 초청 특강 시리즈(강연자: Prof. Steve Mentz)
117438.content: 글로벌 학습 플랫폼 해외 저명 대학 교수 초청 특강 시리즈 강연자 Prof Steve Mentz 해외 저명 대학 교수 초청 글로벌 수업 은 본교 교원 해외 저명 대학 교원 만드 는 수준 높 은 수업 학생 제공 본교 교육 수준 제고 글로벌 학습 플랫 폼 구축 고 통해 해외 저명 대학 교원 간 공동 연구 추진 는 글로벌 연구 플랫 폼 구축 토대 마련 위하 진행 고 있 다 1 강연자 Prof Steve Mentz Steve Mentz is Professor of English at St John s University in New York City His work explores the Blue Humanities Early Modern Literature Ecocriticism Shakespeare and the Literary Theory 2 특강 주제 내용 Kinds of Blue Phases Structures and Climate Change in the Blue Humanities This lecture defines the Blue Humanities as a mode of inquiry into the relationships between humans and water on all levels from the global ocean to water vapor in the air to the water in our bodies An opening discussion of Physical Phases and Literary Structures will explore the meanings and connotations of different kinds of water including fresh salt liquid solid and vapor in human cultures and histories The second half of the lecture will pick up a series of narrative structures that we use to make sense of water including the tropes of submersion buoyancy and literary forms Part of the lecture will draw upon sea poems published in 2024 in my book Sailing without Ahab 3 주관 학부 대학 싸이 몬 스톡 교수 기후 변화 인문학 GEDH 103 4 시 장소 일시 2024 5 10 금 15 00 17 45 장소 인문 사회 과학 캠퍼스 경 영관 33203 호 Live Virtual Studio 5 Zoom 참석 정보 회의 ID PW 360 861 3680 PW 1398 Zoom 링크 https us 02 web zoom us j 3608613680 6 문 학부 대학 사범 대학 행정 실 은혜 책임 02 760 0991 참여 학생 은 Video On Mic Off 주 시 기 바랍니다 iy WM Se ee a 암행 ares Te

116920.title: [글로벌 학습 플랫폼] 해외저명대학 교수 초청 특강 시리즈(강연자: Prof. Serenella Iovino)
116920.content: 글로벌 학습 플랫폼 해외 저명 대학 교수 초청 특강 시리즈 강연자 Prof Serenella Iovino 해외 저명 대학 교수 초청 글로벌 수업 은 본교 교원 해외 저명 대학 교원 만드 는 수준 높 은 수업 학생 제공 본교 교육 수준 제고 글로벌 학습 플랫 폼 구축 고 통해 해외 저명 대학 교원 간 공동 연구 추진 는 글로벌 연구 플랫 폼 구축 토대 마련 위하 진행 고 있 다 1 강연자 Prof Serenella Iovino Serenella Iovino is Professor of Italian Studies and Environmental Humanities at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill Working in the framework of the new materialisms she has contributed to the development of material ecocriticism and is one of the animators of the environmental humanities debate 2 특강 주제 내용 Philosophy and Climate Change A Theoretical and Personal Journey How does philosophy help us think about climate change And what are the texts that allow us to narrate it In this lecture Serenella Iovino an internationally renowned theorist of Environmental Humanities and essayist addresses these questions by sharing her journey From studying 18 th century German philosophy to classic environmental ethics and through the ontologies of new materialisms we will come to consider material and narrative texts that enable us to see the environment as both agent and story at the same time Weaving her landscapes particularly Venice with global dynamics Iovino will lead us to question the way to narrate climate change in light of but also beyond new programmatic literary genres such as cli fi 3 주관 학부 대학 싸이 몬 스톡 교수 기후 변화 인문학 GEDH 103 4 시 장소 일시 2024 4 12 금 15 00 17 45 장소 인문 사회 과학 캠퍼스 경 영관 33203 호 Live Virtual Studio 5 Zoom 참석 정보 회의 ID PW 646 095 5327 PW 1398 Zoom 링크 https us 02 web zoom us j 6460955327 6 문 학부 대학 사범 대학 행정 실 용 해원 선임 02 760 0991 참여 학생 은 Video On Mic Off 주 시 기 바랍니다 SA sie een 배 기스 et ae ee ee i ae 0 Ca be BG eee a 차 aoe oe ak 여려 a Sa Gt Lesh 어서 sid Be es 1 Ds or ee moe ee pes G ER el Fa i ae rae ee ee bbe petra Ge 1 2 한 5482 a 1 a a 아라우 zt Ve We AS is 여아 ee ed Ps gee So ae a ee ee ner ee Sas a 시 티 가로 1 Beg 00005 ee TS aga Eee ee oe Bo 6 Lae Rea ee fa fepino tem eee gE 7 e ee

110589.title: [실험참가자 모집] Join an on-line group discussion
110589.content: 실험 참가자 모집 Join an on line group discussion 안녕 세요 성균관 대학교 DSSA Lab 는 영어 온라인 그룹 토의 는 설문 참여 모집 고자 합니다 일정 매일 다양 한 대 진행 되 며 자세 한 일정 은 웹 사이트 스케줄 참조 장소 온라인 진행 방법 선택 된 주제 3 명 국적 참여 영어 토의 진행 참여 사례 6 000 원 실험 종료 이후 계좌 입금 예정 참여 방법 기 url 접속 https t ly meet skku 문의 p i m g skku com Experiment Recruitment Join an on line group discussion DSSA Lab is searching for participants who would like to participate in a brief online group discussion in English about a random topic and then share their findings on it via a survey WHEN Every day at various times Check the website for the schedule WHERE On line so you can join from anywhere on your PC WHAT A discussion about a selected topic with 3 other international participants in English EARN In appreciation of your valuable time and input each participant will receive 6 000 won Go to https t ly meet skku to join or for more information Questions Mail Pim at p i m g skku com

Notice on Graduation Gowns Rental for 2022 Winter Greetings from Spring the 54 th Student Council of SKKU For undergraduates and postgraduates who have completed a long journey at Sungkyunkwan University we have organized a graduation gowns rental project The rental requires a beforehand reservation and everyone who has applied via online can rent the gowns Warmest congratulations on your graduation Rental Information Subject Degree Recipients on February 2022 Only for Bachelor and Master s Degree Ph D excluded Ineligible for those who have already graduated Period Saturday February 12 2022 Sunday February 20 2022 every day from 9 A M to 6 P M Rental is available during lunch time Gowns must be returned until 6 P M on the day of rental Location Humanities and Social Sciences Campus International Hall 1 F Lounge Natural Sciences Campus Student Center 1 F Auditorium Preparation Mask ID Registration Card Driver s License Residence Card Passport Bag for Gown We ask for your understanding that rental is available only after submission of ID card as a deposit Application for Rental Application Period Thursday February 3 2022 Friday February 11 2022 Application Process GLS PC version 신청 자격 관리 Click on 금학 기졸 업자 학위 복대 여신 청 Enter Visit Day Campus Refund Account Information Apply Pay 5 000 won to the virtual account Rental Fee 5 000 won We issue a virtual account for payment and cash will not be taken Rental fee will be refunded after the end of the whole rental period Parking Information We would like to provide parking fee discounts for those who have rented graduation gowns HSSC 3 000 won charge for 4 hours NSC 2 000 won charge for 4 hours HSSC Parking Fee Payment Process Scan QR Code with Camera Enter 4 digits of the vehicle number and select the vehicle Check parking fee and pay mobile Exit after payment QR Codes can be used at the rental site Additional fee will be charged for exceeding 30 minutes after the payment In the case of HSSC the parking space is small so use public transportation if possible NSC Parking Fee Payment Process Discount ticket provided at the rental site Present the ticket and make payment Further Notice Graduation gowns can be rented only once per person within the rental period Only traditional graduation gowns are available To prevent the spread of COVID 19 and ensure hygiene returned gowns will not be reused Photo walls and backdrops will be installed during the rental period However Geumjandi photo wall will be removed around 15 00 on February 20 In case of lost or damaged gowns the corresponding fee may be charged Traditional Bachelor s Degree Gown Set 132 000 won Traditional Master s Degree Gown Set 179 000 won Inquiry Guide Graduation Preparation Department KakaoTalk Channel skkugradu Please contact us through KakaoTalk first We hope that everyone follows the quarantine rules to prevent the spread of COVID 19 and Spring will also do our best for the safety and health of all members

90253.title: [무역학과]2021 Spring International Webinar 개최 안내 (6/11(금) 15시)
90253.content: 무역 학과 2021 Spring International Webinar 개최 안내 6 11 금 15 시 코로나 19 인해 학술 활동 교류 단절 되 는 가운데 대학원 무역 학과 대학원 무 역학 외국인 유학생 연구 교육 역량 제고 프로그램 일환 한국 인도 아세안 간 해양 무역 경제 협력 주제 2021 Spring International Webinar 개최 합니다 본 국제 학술 세미나 는 한국 인도 미국 일본 4 개국 학자 참여 주제 대한 발표 학술 토론 진행 될 예정 입니다 1 주제 Maritime Trade and Economic Cooperation between Korea India and ASEAN 2 일자 6 11 금요일 15 00 17 20 3 장소 웹 엑스 미팅 룸 문 02 760 0941 무 역학 사무실 PROGRAMME 개 Opening Ceremony Presiding Officer Lee Jaeho Sungkyunlavan University 1500 150 Welcome Address Sandip Kumar Mishra Jawaharlal Nehru University Introductory Remarks Pak Myongsop Dean of department of International Trade Graduate School Sungkyunkwan University Session I English Title 1 India South Korea Economic and Maritime Security Issues in the Region 1510 1549 Moderator Park Taehoon Kansai University Presenter Sandip Kumar Mishra Jawaharlal Nehru University Discussant Kim Hagjur Korean Security Agency of Trade and Industry Title 2 India ASEAN Trade and Maritime Connectivity Moderator Joon John Park University of Arkansas 15 40 16 10 Presenter Prabir De Research and Information System for Developing Countries New Delhi Discussant Lee Jacho Sungkyunkwan University Session II Korean Title 3 A Study on the Economic Effects of Indian Transportation Service on Related Industries 16 10 1640 Moderator Hong Ranju Korea Maritime Business Institute Presenter Park Hyunhyeol Korea Trade Research Association Discussant Kim Taehoo National Research Council for Economics Humanities and Social Sciences Title 4 How to Utilize the Korea ASEAN Maritime Product Network under the New Southern Policy Moderator Kim Ilgwang Woosuk University 1640 17 10 Presenter Pak Jeempar National Korea Maritime Ocean University Discussant Kim Minjae Sungkyunkwan University

Korean law The Korean government is obligated to register health insurance to protect foreign students from unexpected accidents and expensive medical expenses In accordance with the law the Sungkyunkwan University Group Enrollment International Student Insurance KB Insurance which has been levied on the tuition bill will not be levied on the tuition bill from the spring semester of 2021 National Health Insurance Overview 1 Insurance registration period 2021 3 1 Study Abroad D 2 VISA The date of alien registration when entering the country for the first time the date of re entry when entering the country Overseas Koreans and Overseas Koreans F 4 VISA International Students Date of admission to school after arrival Applying to the National Health Insurance Corporation and submitting a certificate of enrollment of the university required graduate students holding F 4 VISA are not eligible for reduction of insurance premiums 2 Insurance fee Monthly insurance fee is 39 540 won based on 2021 Temporary reduction in fee 70 in 2021 60 in 2022 50 in 2023 3 How to pay insurance Pay the bill issued to the address when registering alien to be sent bill from March 10 th pay 73358.title: [에너지과학과 세미나] 2019년 7월 15일(월) 오후2:00 N Center 86120호
73358.content: 에너지 과학 세미나 2019 7 15 오후 2 00 N Center 86120 호 에너지 과학 손동희 교수 님 Texas A M University 모시 고 세미나 개최 오니 관심 있 는 분 많 은 참석 부탁 드립니다 Geka 006 Jul 15 Mon 2019 2 00 PM Room No 86120 N Center Sungkyunkwan University Suwon Controlling photons and charges in colloidal Mn doped semiconductor nanostructures Prof Dong Hee Son Department of Chemistry Texas A M University Abstract This presentation will discuss the control of characteristics of photons and charge carriers in transition metal doped semiconductor nanocrystals with strong quantum confinement Through isoelectronic doping of quantum dot and related quantum nanostructures with Mn ion one can introduce new photophysical processes that enables upconversion of two excitons to a pair of energetic hot charge carriers in addition to generating sensitized phosphorescence via efficient exciton to Mn energy transfer The first part of this presentation will focus on the mechanism of highly energetic hot electron generation its detection in electrochemical and photoemission measurement and application of hot electrons in spatially extended photocatalysis Second part of the discussion will focus on more recent development of new host semiconductor nanocrystals lead halide perovskites of controlled dimensionality and quantum confinement for Mn doping that can potentially produce hot charge carriers more efficiently taking advantage of their superior optical and charge transport characteristics compared to more common II VI and IV VI materials Brief Bio Prof Dong Hee Son received his B S 1992 and M S 1994 from Seoul National University Korea He obtained his Ph D at the University A of Texas Austin 2002 After completing postdoctoral work at University ra of California Berkeley 2005 he joined Texas A M University as an assistant professor 2005 Currently he is a professor of chemistry at Texas A M University His research interest includes the dynamics of 1 공 천 04 0005 10 among different degrees freedom and charge transfer in 1 colloidal nanostructures including semiconducting metallic and magnetic 0 AS nanocrystals and control of the material properties and their chemical reactivity with 66692.content: Notice on Electronic Attendance System Some classrooms with the electronic attendance device were changed Life Science and Tech 62 62352 62353 62354 62306 62351 62355 The Electronic Attendance System is to be used from second semester of 2018 The system has been tested through seven classrooms last semester and now it is installed and on operation in total 101 classrooms 1 Classrooms with Electronic Attendance System See attached manual file In common Students can check their attendance status for all classes they re taking only when the professor uses Smart Attendance System Classrooms with the Electronic Attendance System Students can mark as present with Student ID card or Mobile Application Attendance will be automatically marked in system Classrooms without the Electronic Attendance System Students CANNOT mark with Student ID card or Mobile Application Students should make sure of how professors check students attendance for each classes as attendance method can differ by professors regardless of the Electronic Attendance System 2 How to install and enter the system 1 Mobile Application Search SungKyunKwan University Electronic Attendance in Google Playstore App store and download the application Log in with Kingo ID 2 PC Enter http attend skku edu Log in with Kingo ID 3 How to use the system See attached manual file 4 Notice You must install the application prior to using the Electronic Attendance System A method of requesting for Attendance Status Change is now to be approved online Please check out the additional notice that will be made later on If any false attendance using the Electronic Attendance System is detected a penalty might be imposed on your grade

65207.title: [세미나]Digital Civics: Infrastructuring Participatory Citizenship
65207.content: 세미나 Digital Civics Infrastructuring Participatory Citizenship Human Computer Interaction HCI Digital Design 분야 세계 적 인 석학 인 Patrick Olivier 교수 모시 고 세미나 개최 합니다 관심 있 는 교수 님 연구자 학생 많 은 참여 부탁드립니다 제목 Digital Civics Infrastructuring Participatory Citizenship 연사 Prof Patrick Olivier Open Lab Newcastle University UK 일시 2018 6 28 화 오전 10 시 장소 N 센터 86126 호 초록 This talk is about a research initiative in Digital Civics proposing the use of digital technologies in the provision of relational models of public services that is models that take as a starting point the potential of digital technologies to support citizen focused sharing of knowledge experience and resources Digital Civics research is inherently cross disciplinary action oriented and place based and this requires us to configure ourselves differently to the communities with whom we conduct our research In this talk I will be describing examples of our digital civics research from applications in community engagement and education to public health and social justice as well as the trajectory and pragmatics of the overall endeavour 첨부 파일 참고 문 기계 공학부 이상원 교수 sangwonl skku edu 031 290 7467

61340.content: Samsung Display Vietnam 외국인 유학생 채용 안내 Jobs at Samsung Display Vietnam Co Ltd Samsung Display is a global No 1 leading display company Based on the most advanced OLED LCD panels we ve been leading innovation on next generation displays with flexible transparent technology and more We are looking for talented and driven Vietnamese students studying at universities in Korea We hope your participation and application to build your career at Samsung Display Job Type Regular full time Position Process Facility engineer for science engineering students Support team Management Purchasing Infra etc for non science engineering students Target Applicants Candidates for graduation 16 or Graduates Bachelor Master s degree Necessary Skills Language Proficiency in English or Korean Major No limitation on applicants major Location Samsung Display Vietnam Co Ltd Yen Phong district Bac Ninh province Vietnam Resume Submission Reply via e mail sgng lee samsung com with the attached application form Be sure that your resume is written in English Submission Period 16 5 8 Sun 17 00 GSAT Global Samsung Aptitude Test 16 5 14 Sat The test will be proceeded in Vietnamese For any inquiries please contact to Samsung Display HR team 82 41 623 8477 82 10 5181 1291 Thank you

University 1983 BS biology The Catholic University of America 1979 경력 William Kim is a partner in the corporate department of Ropes Gray chairs the firm s Korea practice and is a member of the firm s office managing partners committee He also co chairs the firm s international practice group Bill is the first foreign lawyer to be registered in Korea to practice as foreign legal consultant and heads our firm s Seoul office Bill also represents many technology oriented Korean clients in technology transfers and complex licensing arrangements In patent litigation cases he has represented many of the largest companies in Korea including LG Electronics Hyundai Motor Kia Motor Hyundai Heavy Industries and other Korea based multinational conglomerates Bill also oversees complex business various compliance programs for the company including antitrust U S Federal Corrupt Practices Act FCPA anti bribery unfair competition unlawful discrimination and sexual harassment 롭스 앤그레이 서울 사무소 는 59212.title: Announcement about Postdoctoral Research Program, 2015
59212.content: Announcement about Postdoctoral Research Program 2015 Announcement about Postdoctoral Research Program 2015 To foster new researchers and enhance the research power announce Postdoctoral Research program 2015 as below 1 Purpose A To provide promising doctoral researchers with opportunities to conduct research activities B To keep new researchers carry out work research and to promote quantity and quality improvement by publishing papers Enhance the research power through training excellent research 2 Scope of Support A Number of applicants supported No more than 16 people We will announce convergence track in July August B KRW 18 million per person KRW 1 5 million month 12 months Severance pay and four major public insurance can be supported separately C Period of Support 1 year March 1 2015 February 29 2016 After selected it is supported retroactively from March 1 D Qualifications of Applicants 1 Applicants A Less than 5 years since obtaining doctor s degree Those who obtained doctor s degree since January 1 2010 or those who are scheduled to obtain doctor s degree in February 28 2015 Those who obtained or are scheduled to obtain doctor s degree in our university and other university may apply Both Korean and Alien Korean with foreign nationalities may apply B Both employed and unemployed doctors may apply But employed applicants must resign from their jobs as soon as they are selected so that they can start training programs C Those who possible to work as full time researcher at the institution in Sungkyunkwan University after selecting D Those who have research accomplishments as same as below by deadline Humanities and Social Science including Arts and Sport Science Two or more papers published in journals registered with the National Research Foundation of Korea or one or more papers in A HCI and SSCI level journal Science One or more papers published in SCI Core or SCI Expanded or at least 1 international patent 2 Academic advisor Full time faculty above assistant professor one trainee per an adviser 3 Documents to submit A Application form Annex 1 File type Word file Change first page of application as PDF file include signature File name format Expectative institution Applicant s name Postdoctoral Research Program 2015 doc B Research Proposal Annex 2 Word file C Application s Information List of Research Achievement Appendix 1 Excel file File name format Expectative institution Applicant s name Information List of Research Achievement Postdoctoral Research Program 2015 xlsx xls D A copy of the cover of publications papers you listed Including journal name title authors PDF file E A copy of the cover of writing translations you listed Including publisher name title authors PDF file F A copy of patents you listed Including journal name title authors PDF file G Certificate of doctor s degree PDF file Certification of the expectant doctor s degree Those who are scheduled to obtain doctor s degree in February 28 2015 4 Application Procedure A Period of application Until 17 00 March 16 Fri 2015 B Application Procedure Send the application file and other documents by e mail to search 09 skku edu C Representative Jo Hyun Research Promotion Team Research Business Foundation Contact 031 290 5761 search 09 skku edu D Announcement 1 Post to Notice in main homepage of Sungkyunwan University 2 Post to Board Notice faculty research subject of research in Kongo Portal homepage Attachment 1 Guidelines for Postdoctoral Research Program 2015 Attachment 2 Documents to submit for Postdoctoral Research Program 2015

57835.title: Int`l Office Job Opening
57835.content: Int l Office Job Opening Sungkyunkwan University SKKU invites applicants for the position of international officer Under the general direction of the director of the International Office the international officer working on the strategic planning development maintenance of international networks and the implementation of international programs EXAMPLES OF DUTIES Duties may include but are not limited to the following 1 Develop new partners and seek opportunities for international collaboration 2 Prepare written reports presentations speeches and procedures 3 Develop promote international programs 4 Coordinate office and departmental logistics as needed 5 Advise and support departmental programming 6 Provide coverage to office reception and protocol 7 Perform other related job duties as assigned Qualifications 1 Three to five years work experience in related fields preferred 2 Completion of four years of college education preferably in one or more of the following areas Social Science International Business Business Administration or Marketing and Public Relations 3 Master s degree in International Education Student Affairs International Relations Studies or related field preferred 4 Prior experience working in a cross cultural environment 5 Valid working visa visa sponsorship may be offered by the university upon further agreement with applicant upon passing the final screening process Conditions of Contract Location Humanities and Social Sciences Campus Seoul Employment term 1 year contract renewable Office hours Monday to Friday 09 00 17 30 Salary negotiable upon contract with applicant that pass the final screening process Submission Documents 1 A current resume 2 A cover letter highlighting your qualifications for the desired position 3 Copy of diplomas and set of official transcripts 4 Copy of passport with current visa stamp or foreigner ID card Application Due Date May 29 2014 Application Address Please submit all required application materials by email to intl skku edu Or send documents via post mail to International Office Sungkyunkwan University 25 2 Sungkyunkwan ro Jongno gu Seoul Korea Information provided by applicants or references will be kept confidential documents will not be returned Successful candidates will be notified for the interview Inquiry thwon skku edu

57687.title: 국제개발협력 전문가 차문중 박사님 교내 강연
57687.content: 국제 개발 협력 전문가 차문중 박사 님 교내 강연 국제 개발 협력 국내 최고 전문가 성균관 대 특강 장소 인 문관 31308 호 4 10 목요일 오후 3 시 4 시 15 분 4 10 오후 3 시 정우 교수 님 사회학 입문 강의 차문중 경제 부총리 문관 님 는 강연 열립니다 차문중 박사 님 은 전 KDI 국제 개발 협력 센터 소장 역임 고 KSP 사업 총괄 했 던 국제 개발 협력 분야 특히 지식 공유 사업 KSP Knowledge Sharing Program 분야 국내 최고 전문가 십니다 특강 는 KSP 내용 다룰 계획 며 특강 이후 는 5 시 6 시 61805 학생 만나 질 응답 갖 는 자유 로운 간담회 도 개최 됩니다 참여 방법 참여 원하 는 학생 은 정우 교수 님 jkoo skku edu 이메일 직접 신청 실 수 있 강연 비 공식 간담회 참여 해도 좋 고 다 참여 는 도 가능 며 참여 원하 시 는 프로그램 이름 소속 전화 번호 이메일 보내 주 시 면 됩니다 국제 개발 협력 분야 관심 있 는 학생 놓치 지 말 할 좋 은 기회 니 많 은 참여 부탁 드립니다 차문 중 문관 님 이력 는 참조 해 주 세요 MoonJoong Tcha is currently Senior Advisor to Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Strategy and Finance of the Republic of Korea and also affiliated with Korea Development Institute KDI as Senior Fellow Before he joined government he had served as Executive Director Center for International Development at KDI in charge of KSP Knowledge Sharing Program a pillar of development cooperation of the Korean government Dr Tcha studied Economics at Seoul National University BA and at the University of Chicago PhD in 1992 Affiliated with the University of Western Australia as a Faculty member for 12 years he also served for many international institutions including the University of Chicago Australia National University University of New South Wales Seoul National University and KDI School of Public Policy and Management He joined KDI in 2005 as Senior Fellow and served as Director of Office for Economic Development Cooperation and Vice President and Director of Department of Industrial and Corporate Affairs He worked as a consultant for international organizations such as World Bank Institute OECD Africa Development Bank and UNSACAP Having served for various teams and committees of the Korean government including Public Sector Appraisal Team Government Performance Appraisal Team and Public Sector Transparency Appraisal Team currently he is a member of Green Growth Committee and National Statistics Committee Dr Tcha published a large number of professional papers and authored edited books in the fields including international economics development economics public sector economics development cooperation service industry regulation real estate and culture and sports economics He has been working as Project Manager for large scale projects for governments and was awarded National Decoration in 2009 due to his research on the relationship between institutions and economic performance He loves various sports including tennis golf skiing bowling basketball baseball and soccer He also loves playing with his two kids Kyungchae Estelle and Dongyoung Alwyn however is a bit depressed nowadays as they are too busy for their own studying to find time to play with him
